import { Component, OnInit, ViewEncapsulation } from '@angular/core'; import { vrInfo } from 'src/vrInfo'; import { HEADSETS } from '../../mock-vrInfo'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vrinfo', templateUrl: './vrinfo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vrinfo.component.css'] }) export class VRInfoComponent implements OnInit { headsetsList = HEADSETS; imagePathQuest3: string = 'assets/images/metaquest3.png'; imagePath: string = 'assets/images/downloadAsset.png'; ngOnInit(): void { } sendOSC() { fetch("http://localhost:3000/VRHeadsets"); //http://localhost:3000/DownloadAssets/VR1 } }
